long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track your FAVORITE GitHub repos with this nifty Chrome extension!!! AWwwsome, right? Cool.

To create a Github OAuth 2.0 token, go to https://github.com/settings/tokens and select the "repos" namespace to generate a token. This will give the token access to any private repos you might have access to.

If you found this helpful, remember to smash that like button, subscribe if you haven't already, and become a Patreon supporter if you wish to do so.
